title: Goat's cheese, cranberry and oatmeal tartlets
ingredients: ['1 quantity oat shortcrust pastry, chilled for at least 30 minutes', 'Filling', '3 large eggs', '120ml (4 fl oz) plain low-fat yogurt', '300ml (10 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '4 tablespoons cranberry sauce', '3 tablespoons snipped fresh chives', "85g (3 oz) goat's cheese, crumbled", 'salt and pepper']
